42689216610491.name: Gilliam Hard Candy Sticks - 80ct
42689216610491.desc: Old fashioned hard candy sticks are the ultimate go-to treat for anyone with a sweet tooth. Stick candy has been a favorite of young and old since the mid-1800s, and it's no wonder why. Each piece features a unique flavor and fun colors that make every lick a memorable experience! Simply peel away the hard candy wrapper and you are ready to snack. Each piece is individually wrapped so they are easy to store and can be given as party favors or a special treat for the kids!We carry a huge list of exciting flavors so you never get bored. Try exotic pina colada, orange pineapple or rum and butter! If you prefer something simpler, classic bubblegum, peppermint, sassafras or strawberry are just as enticing. You'll love watching the striped candy melt away with each bite! Grab the old family photo album and your favorite flavors and relive your childhood memories with Gilliam hard candy sticks!

42688630456507.name: Candy Cigarettes - 24ct
42688630456507.desc: Gee Wiz. These 1950's inspired Candy Cigarette packs are the perfect addition to a retro party. Puff on these as a sugary and healthier alternative to the regular variety. Their chalky texture and light, minty flavor are a mouth freshener. And their pretty white coloring make them a perfect match for any occasion. Have a friend who's calling it quits? Need realistic and yummy props for a school play? Having a get together in a non-smoking environment? Get a package of these to do it all. With 1 candy cigarettes per pack and 24 packs per order, you'll be puffing in the deliciousness all day long.

42688384303291.name: Dubble Bubble Gum - 5lb
42688384303291.desc: What's pink, chewy, and was eaten by the ancient Greeks and the Mayans centuries ago? Bubblegum! Bet you didn't know gum had such a historic past. Now that you do, bring a bag of this delicious, classic Dubble Bubble Gum home for your family to try. Individually wrapped with the power to blow monstrous bubbles, these little bubblegums make the perfect choice to fill a piﾐata, add to a birthday candy buffet bar, or to use as filler candy in a present. You can even bring a bag of Dubble Bubble to a baseball game and chew along with the players. Whatever you do, you'll love chewing, tasting, and blowing bubbles with this time-tested favorite.

42688522256571.name: Mary Janes Candy - 7.5lb
42688522256571.desc: Back from limbo after Necco's bankruptcy, Mary Janes are here again!When you're in the mood for something extra chewy, try our sweet Mary Jane candies! These delectable delights are small bars of smooth taffy treats. Each is flavored with rich molasses and peanut butter to give it that memorable taste that kids of all ages have been asking for since 1914. The candy is a historic favorite that was named after its creator's beloved aunt -  a worthy choice for such a nostalgic confection!Each taffy candy is covered in a bright yellow wrapper with a bold red stripe and classic logo printed around both sides. The newest version is smaller than Necco's and not as squared in shape, but it's the same amazing recipe as ever. You'll love Mary Janes even more when you buy our bulk candy package! Order larger quantities so you have plenty to share at family gatherings and other events. Use them to fill the office candy jar or use them to fill treat bags for birthdays and more! Our bulk Mary Janes are also convenient to hand out on trick or treat night around Halloween!Mary Janes are being made by Atkinson Candies now, makers of Chick-O-Stick and Long Boys candy, among many others.

42688554533051.name: Nut Goodie Bar Original Candy Bars - 24ct
42688554533051.desc: Nostalgic. Classic. Vintage. You're a special kind of candy fan who appreciates where every sweet got its roots. With these Nut Goodie's, you can enjoy a taste of yesteryear in every milk chocolatey, nutty bite! Introduced in 1912, Nut Goodie hit candy store shelves for a whopping 5 cents! To this day, not much has changed about the delicious, salty, sweet nut clusters including their vintage wrapper. Add these to a 2's themed party for a tasty treat, share a bit of history with loved ones, or surprise your grandmother or grandfather with a taste of their youth. Whatever you do, you'll love these tried and true confections.

42726952108219.name: Watermelon Candy Sticks - 80ct
42726952108219.desc: Candy sticks have always been fun. Now you can get the same candy sticks that you have come to love in a watermelon flavor. Another great thing about these candies is the red and green color. This means that they would be great to use around the Christmas holiday. You could even use them at your Christmas holiday party. Children and adults are sure to enjoy this fun hard candy. The sticks are the perfect size to allow you to enjoy them without feeling that you weren't able to finish the whole stick. Since the flavor is fruit you may even find these are great to enjoy during the summer as well. Actually for those who love watermelon flavor these are perfect all year around. Even better is the fact that they are wrapped individually to help make sure that they stay fresh even if you don't use them all at one time.

42726939230395.name: Peppermint Candy Sticks - 80ct
42726939230395.desc: It's a candy cane without the curve. Peppermint sticks are a refreshing treat that has been around for years. Old fashioned stick candy was first created in the 1830s. It quickly became a favorite snack for adults and children. By the 1860s, most candy shops and carnivals featured this item because it sold so well. Today we still savor the convenient shape and rich taste of hard candy sticks, especially when they come in a classic flavor like peppermint! Our bulk hard candy is easy to serve and share. Each piece is wrapped in clear plastic. Place them upright in a clear jar or cup at home or as part of the food selection at parties. You can also tuck a few inside treat bags or wedding favors to give your guests something sweet to remember the occasion by. Our peppermint candy sticks feature a pure white background with solid and pinstripes that twist in an alternating pattern from top to bottom.

42726931071163.name: Cinnamon Candy Sticks - 80ct
42726931071163.desc: With the charm of an old barbershop pole, the spicy sweetness of cinnamon, and a hard candy crunch this old fashioned stick has it all. You can satisfy a spicy and sweet craving, stir them into a cup of hot cocoa or hot mulled cider for a unique twist, and even use them as an adorable decoration on a gingerbread house! There are just so many possibilities. And with 8 sticks in every package, there are enough to do it all. These classic sticks have been around for generations and still have the gusto to wow your friends and family.

42688374931643.name: Mallo Cups - 24ct
42688374931643.desc: This candy is over 100 years old! Well, not this particular batch, (that would be gross!) but the brand itself has a legacy dating back to the early 1900s. Created by the Boyer Brothers, these Mallo Cups are a classic with a melty chocolate coating over puffy, fluffy marshmallow cups. Add these to your s'mores recipe for chocolate and marshmallow in one! They can be skewered and roasted, or just added to a candy bar buffet and doled out to friends and family at your next get together. If you like the ooey, gooey, chewiness of marshmallow and the rich, melty taste of chocolate, try these classics on for size.

42688370147515.name: Chick-O-Stick Bars - 24ct
42688370147515.desc: Chewy. Salty. Sweet. Peanutty. What don't these Chick-O-Stick Bars have? These amazing and classic candies are full of roasted peanuts dusted with salt and pure sugar then sprinkled with coconut. Can we hear a "YUM!"These candies also come in an original stick-like shape, so you can eat them by the inch or the foot if you so choose. Bring some of these fantastic Chick-O-Stick Bars home to your friends and family to stick into ice cream sundaes, dip into ice cream floats as a stirrer, munch on while you watch a movie or just to try something delicious and new. You won't regret ordering Chick-O-Stick Bars.

42726951715003.name: Tutti Frutti Candy Sticks - 80ct
42726951715003.desc: This candy has a name that's almost as fun to say as the candy is to eat! However, we still think it's fruity, sweet flavor is the best part. Try these Tutti Fruiti Old Fashioned Candy Sticks for a delicious burst of bright, fruity flavor. Their beautiful yellow, pink, and green swirls make them a perfect addition to a Mardi Gras party or even for New Years Eve! Try these crunchy, hard candy sticks in cold lemonade or punch for a dose of extra sweetness and fresh, fruity flavor. Even bring some to a party with friends as a delicious dessert or pack them up in a present for a flavor flashback everyone can enjoy. With 8 sticks per order, you'll have enough to do it all.

42726941032635.name: Green Apple Candy Sticks - 80ct
42726941032635.desc: Green apple candy sticks have a classic striped look and an amazingly delicious and pucker-inducing flavor. While they look a little bit like candy canes, they have a totally different, refreshing taste. These green and white candy sticks look great in a candy jar when you're entertaining guests. You could even put them out for a St. Patrick's Day party. Each sour apple candy stick is individually wrapped, so they make great candies to put out at parties or in party favor bags.

42726886604987.name: Claey's Horehound Candy Drops - 10lb
42726886604987.desc: Pop one of these old-fashioned sore throat remedies in your mouth for a sweet taste of the good old days. Dusted with sugar, Natural Horehound Claey's Old-Fashioned Candy Drops have a classic, herbal taste. You can give them to your kids for a special treat or to soothe their sore throats. Why suck on a cough drop that just tastes like medicine when you can get the same effect with an old-fashioned candy drop?

42689194819771.name: Claey's Old-Fashioned Candy Drops - 10lb
42689194819771.desc: Pretty, pretty please with sugar on top? You don't have to beg us to give you a delicious treat, sugar lovers. We have a candy that will satisfy even the most voracious sweet tooth! Claey's Old-Fashioned Candy Drops are completely coated in crystally, crunchy sugar granules that will make your taste buds jump for joy. Beyond the saccharine coating, lies a delicious hard candy in a variety of colors and flavors. Try green apple, licorice, natural horehound, root beer, watermelon, lemon, and wild cherry in every bag. They'll look lovely in your coffee table candy dish or set out in a jar.

42726946111675.name: Cotton Candy Candy Sticks - 80ct
42726946111675.desc: There is just something that can be said about the flavor of cotton candy. Well what if you were able to get a candy stick that was a cotton candy flavor? The good news is that you really can. These sticks come individually wrapped. You will also find that the design that they have is amazing. They are blue and pink in color and this means that it will make them great for many occasions. It would really make a great treat for a baby shower where the gender of the baby was still unknown. These sticks are hard in texture and that is great for those who like to have a little bit of a crunch or enjoy licking on their candy. You can get a count of 8 of these great candies so that there is sure to be enough to go around for everyone. After all these are sure to be a hit with everyone who gets the pleasure of trying them.

42726947881147.name: Orange Candy Sticks - 80ct
42726947881147.desc: Candy sticks are a favorite of many. These great candy sticks are hard candy that is in the shape of a stick. They are orange in flavor. They also have a great orange color to them that would blend well when use for almost any occasion. You will find that these might really work great around Halloween as each one is individually wrapped, so if you are giving them out to children that you don't know then the parents are not as likely to be concerned with it. You can either suck on the sticks until they are gone, or if you are one that likes to crunch then you will be able to do this as well. However, you should know that it is not good for your teeth so do this at your own risks. However, you decide to enjoy your sticks you are sure to find that they will hit the spot.

42726945030331.name: Cherry Candy Sticks - 80ct
42726945030331.desc: Love is in the air. And these Red Cherry Old Fashioned Candy sticks are just the candy to show a loved one that your heart skips a beat every time you see them. Awww! In each box, 8 individually wrapped, sparkling red sticks are ready to spread their love to the ones you adore most. Set them out in a heart shape on the kitchen counter as a loving surprise. Add extra charm to a candy basket display. Even use them in Valentine's Day cards to your friends and family. There are no wrong ways to show your adoration of others with this fruity, sweet, red treat.

42726937723067.name: Lemon Candy Sticks - 80ct
42726937723067.desc: Being old fashioned will never go out of style. And these lemon stick candies are a perfect example of that philosophy. With their scrumptious, citrusy flavor, hard candy crunch, and pleasing shape, they've stood up to the test of time and taste buds. Use them as an adorable stirrer in summer refreshments or enjoy them as they are. With 8 sticks in every package, there's enough to do it all. These old fashioned candy sticks have been around for generations and still have the gusto to wow your friends and family. We're positive you'll be pleased with their light, sweet taste.

42688370344123.name: Neapolitan Coconut Bar - 24ct Box
42688370344123.desc: Candy does not have to be fruity, gummy, sour, or covered in chocolate. This Neapolitan Coconut Bar breaks away from all the stereotypes and is 100 percent indulgent. Plus, its pretty pink and white display makes it charming enough to serve on a silver platter for dessert at your next dinner party. These bars are also perfect for baby showers, weddings, and birthday parties for little princesses who love everything pink. When you bite into a Neapolitan Coconut Bar you will agree that it just might taste better than the real thing. Imagine moist and chewy coconut flesh pressed into a bar to eat, without spending an hour trying to pry the shell open and clean the fibers off the coconut meat. For many generations, enjoying Neapolitan Coconut Bars was considered a Southern tradition. This is a one-of-a-kind sweet treat that you will crave.

42688662634683.name: Long Boys Coconut - 48ct
42688662634683.desc: Long Boys coconut candy sticks are a classic favorite that's full of rich flavor! This traditional candy originated in New Orleans, making it a staple for local children. Today, people all over the country rave about the amazing taste of these long, chewy confections. Every piece includes a stick of candy that's individually wrapped in a nostalgic red and yellow wrapper. Coconut Long Boys offer a unique blend of caramel and exotic coconut for a snacking experience that's memorable and satisfying! Untwist the wrapper and take small bites to fully enjoy the taste of this one-of-a-kind flavor combination! Kids can try stretching their Long Boy candy to see who can make the longest rope!Our bulk Long Boy coconut candy is a great choice for parties, picnics and family reunions. Use them to fill treat bags for birthdays or set out a bowl or box so adults can munch while reminiscing about their favorite childhood sweets!

42726944243899.name: Butterscotch Candy Sticks - 80ct
42726944243899.desc: Butterscotch and candy sticks: two classics that have finally united to bring you a nostalgic taste of yesteryear! Bring back the happy, memory-filled days of yore with a lick of one of these Butterscotch Old Fashioned Candy Sticks. Their golden yellow and honey colored swirls are a perfect complement to their rich, buttery taste. Stock up on these for a festive Thanksgiving dessert addition, use them as a delicious hot chocolate stirrer, or just have some around the house for any of your classic candy fans to enjoy. With 8 individually wrapped candy sticks in each box, you'll have enough to go around.

42726940377275.name: Root Beer Candy Sticks - 80ct
42726940377275.desc: The flavor of root beer is a flavor that is loved by many. Most people remember the flavor of root beer from making root beer floats as a child. Well now you can get this great flavor in a candy stick. The sticks are fun and they are brown and white which makes them extremely appealing as well. Each stick is wrapped individually in order to help keep them fresh and seal in the flavor. You will also find that these are hard candies so if you love a hard candy and the root beer flavor then this is right up your alley way. You can even stick one of these in your float to really make it fun and exciting. You get 8 sticks and this manes that you will have plenty to enjoy. The size of the sticks is 5 inches in length so there is plenty of candy and flavor in each stick.

42726887784635.name: Claey's Wild Cherry Candy Drops - 10lb
42726887784635.desc: What's red, sweet, and delicious all over? These Wild Cherry Claey's Old Fashioned Candy Drops! Dusted in crystalized, sweet sugar, these bright red candies pack a serious punch of wild cherry flavor that will make your taste buds jump for joy. Bring some to a holiday gathering that needs a dose of festive red, use some to decorate a gingerbread house with a delicious treat, add them to a Fourth of July dessert table, or add a yummy, fruity treat to a Valentine's Day gift. With this 1 pound order of wild cherry candies, you'll have enough to go around.

44600713412795.name: Satellite Wafers Candy - Sour & Original - 240ct
44600713412795.desc: It's a UFO! These Satellite Wafers Candies are invading airspace and mouth space with their amazing light, wafer exterior, and beaded candy interior. In a rainbow of colors and flavors, these old fashioned candies will delight every extraterrestrial and human candy fan. Bring some to a party for a fun way to satisfy a sweet tooth, bring a handful to a science fair for some thematic snacking, or even surprise your future astronauts with a taste of outer space. Whatever you do, this 240 count package of Satellite Wafers Candy will take you on a flavor journey that's ''out of this world. ''

42726949650619.name: Raspberry Candy Sticks - 80ct
42726949650619.desc: Red. Fruity. Pretty to look at and even more delicious to eat. These Raspberry Old Fashioned Candy Sticks have been stocking candy store shelves for years because of their loveable fruity flavor and hard candy crunch. Have a Valentine's Day party coming up? Want to surprise a sweetie with a delicious and romantic treat? Want to add something special to your lemonades and punches this summer by using these sticks as a lovely and delectable garnish? The raspberry sticks can do it all and more. With 8 sticks per order, you'll have enough to satisfy your sweet tooth for a long, long time.

42688790986939.name: Claey's Green Apple Drop Bags - 24ct
42688790986939.desc: Claey's Green Apple Drops offer the same great taste candy lovers have been celebrating since 1919. Each piece is made by molding the candy then dropping it onto a roller before bagging. This version comes in a delicious green apple flavor with the familiar shape and texture. Claey's hard candy is a convenient snack when on the go, at home, or when guests stop by!

42688422412475.name: Cinnamon Toothpicks Hotlix - 20ct
42688422412475.desc: Nothing tops off a good meal like Cinnamon Toothpix to clean your teeth! Sit back, relax, and freshen your breath with these cinnamon flavored sticks. The are infused with real cinnamon oil!They are a great, flavorful tool to keep around the house for guests, to keep in your purse if you need one, or just to chew on if you love the cinnamony flavor! In reusable tubes, these pointy picks can be stored safely without worry of poking yourself or others. And when you're done, you can use the tube again to store some more! Bring some of these home today to help you attain a cleaner mouth and enjoy a taste of spicy cinnamon every time you use them.

42726951321787.name: Strawberry Candy Sticks - 80ct
42726951321787.desc: Why did the baby strawberry cry? Because his parents were in a jam! We just love that one and think you'll love our Strawberry Old Fashioned Candy Sticks too! With a red a green swirl, these sticks look like the beautiful berries that are picked in a patch. Stir them into cold summertime drinks for a lovely garnish and splash of sugary, berry flavor. Bring them to a baby shower or a party that requires something sweet. Or just keep them around the house to suck on when you need a delicious sweet treat that reminds you of spring. This 8 count order of sticks will keep you busy snack, after snack.

42727004635323.name: Satellite Wafers Candy Original - 240ct
42727004635323.desc: It's a UFO! These Satellite Wafers Candies are invading airspace and mouth space with their amazing light, wafer exterior, and beaded candy interior. In a rainbow of colors and flavors, these old fashioned candies will delight every extraterrestrial and human candy fan. Bring some to a party for a fun way to satisfy a sweet tooth, bring a handful to a science fair for some thematic snacking, or even surprise your future astronauts with a taste of outer space. Whatever you do, this 240 count package of Satellite Wafers Candy will take you on a flavor journey that's ''out of this world.''

42726930186427.name: Bubblegum Candy Sticks - 80ct
42726930186427.desc: Bubblegum, bubblegum in a dish. How many pieces do you wish? Apparently, you're wishing for a whole 80 count bag of Bubblegum Old Fashioned Candy Sticks! With a rainbow of red, yellow, blue, green, and white, these sticks are tasty as they are beautiful. Their hard candy crunch and colorful style make them the perfect candy for amongst any event you can dream up. Stick one in a cool fruity drink as an adorable and unique stirrer. Display these in a glass vase on your kitchen counter for a lovely look. Even bring these to a party and set them out on the dessert table as a different and delicious treat! You'll love these bubblegum sticks no matter what you do.

42727073611963.name: Sour Apple Candy Sticks - 80ct
42727073611963.desc: Sour apple candy sticks are an old time favorite that kids and adults will enjoy. This classic candy starts with a tube of hard confection. Every inch is packed with mouth puckering sour apple flavor in dark green with a white double stripe. Ours arrive individually packaged in the nostalgic Gilliam wrapper so you know you’re getting the best! Our sour apple candy sticks are a great choice for party favors and casual snacking.

42726886965435.name: Claey's Root Beer Candy Drops - 10lb
42726886965435.desc: We're rooting for these classic candies. That's because Claey's Root Beer Old-Fashioned Candy Drops are completely coated in crystally, crunchy sugar granules that will make your taste buds jump for joy. Beyond the saccharine coating, lies a delicious hard candy. They'll take you back to a warm, summer's day of sipping a refreshing root beer float. Stock up on some to add to root beer treats, add to a gift basket, or put out on the Thanksgiving table. Among root beer, Claey's favorite flavors include green apple, licorice, natural horehound, watermelon, lemon, and wild cherry. They'll look lovely in your coffee table candy dish or set out in a jar.

42726948765883.name: Passion Fruit Candy Sticks - 80ct
42726948765883.desc: Candy art is what Passion Fruit Candy Sticks are. They are as pretty as they are tasty, and if you resist the urge to bite, one stick will last a very long time. Passion fruit is not a fruit many people have access to in their local market, which makes this flavor an extra special treat. The sweet, fruity flavor will make it feel like summer, even if there is snow on the ground.Red, white, green, blue, pink, and yellow stripes swirl to create these yummy treats. Skip the bouquet of flowers, and create a bouquet of these in a vase instead. They are perfect for centerpieces or to hand out at Halloween. If you have a business, a jar of these sure will bring a little excitement to your counter. Passion Fruit Candy Sticks are kosher certified, gluten-free, and individually wrapped.

42688554991803.name: Nut Roll Bars - 24ct
42688554991803.desc: Salty. Crunchy. Sweet. These Nut Roll Bars have it all! Coated in creamy, chewy nougat with whole peanuts to munch on, these candy bars are a favorite among nut fanatics and sweet and salty lovers, alike! They're great for a sweet tooth or as a protein packed snack. Bring them on a hike for a big dose of energy, treat your close friends and family with these for a different dessert, or even crumble them up into baking recipes you love. With 24 candy bars per box, you'll go ''nuts'' with all of the deliciousness you'll have to snack on.

42688615448763.name: Crows - Theater Size - 12ct
42688615448763.desc: If you love licorice but prefer to skip the twists, Crows candy are a must-try. This gumdrop confection is a delicious alternative to licorice ropes. Each piece is full of traditional licorice flavor. Every bite includes a short, domed shape √ê just like a classic gumdrop! Unlike classic gumdrops, Crows candy are solid black. The smooth surface adds a hint of shine that makes these ebony treats so eye-catching. The original Crows licorice candy was created over 100 years ago in the 1890s. The Black Crows brand was trademarked in 1911. It was later acquired by the famous Tootsie Roll Industries. Our bulk Crows theater box pack gives you more of your favorite fat free candy! Every bite is so delicious and a better snack compared to fattier foods. Our bulk theater box candies are convenient for events, gatherings and holidays. Give classic candy as a Christmas stocking stuffer or hand them out during family movie night!

42688748159163.name: Hershey's Nostalgia Milk Chocolate Bar - 24ct
42688748159163.desc: Feel like you're stepping back into the days of yesteryear with these Hershey's Nostalgia Milk Chocolate Bars. With the same classic milk chocolate that's been around since 1893, these chocolate bars harken back to the days they were born with classic and nostalgic wrappers that make them look true to their time. If you have someone who loves old fashioned candy and you'd like to surprise them with something special, then bring home some of these Hershey's Nostalgia Milk Chocolate Bars. They'll look great paired with other historic candies or served up right on their own. If you're having an era-inspired party, then these Hershey's Nostalgia Milk Chocolate Bars would also make a great addition to the dessert table or gift baggies you plan on doling out to your guests.

42726980616379.name: Cherry Cola Salt Water Taffy - 2.5lb
42726980616379.desc: Bring the soda shop to your sock hop with Cherry Cola Salt Water Taffy! Just the ticket for tempting those who think they've tried it all, these mouthwatering taffy pieces are individually wrapped and boldly striped, with red bands running down the outsides of creamy brown candy pieces.This wholesale taffy is a perfect choice for bulk candy sellers as well as a novel way to match a muted red color scheme with warm earth-toned candy pieces. Saltwater taffy has been popular for generations, many families can't go to the seaside without buying at least one bag to munch on the way home √ê and this bulk single-flavor poundage of Cherry Cola Salt Water Taffy shows you what to love about the classic sweet once again.You'll almost taste the fizz when you bite into a soft, chewy piece of Cherry Cola Taffy, and the individual wrappers make sure that the flavor stays fresh and intense in every single piece.

42726929432763.name: Banana Candy Sticks - 80ct
42726929432763.desc: Banana hard candy sticks bring rich, tropical flavor in a convenient confection. Old fashioned candy sticks are a popular treat for young and old alike. The beauty of the stick style hard candy lies in its convenience.You get big flavor that's individually wrapped so you can take them with you anywhere. Hide one in your purse, pocket, glove box or desk drawer so you can satisfy sweet cravings without delay! Our banana candy sticks aren't just good to eat, they are also beautiful to look at! Each includes a bright yellow color that's decorated in a deep maroon stripe that spirals from top to bottom.This warm color combination looks stunning when displayed upright in a vase, jar or wherever! Place them on guest tables at events and parties or use them to fill wedding favors, treat bags, Easter baskets or Christmas stockings. Combine with your other favorite hard candy stick flavors to create the ultimate taste experience!

42689103823035.name: Cavendish & Harvey Orange Drops Tin - 12ct
42689103823035.desc: Gorgeous orange hard candy drops in stylish tins! Made with natural orange and dusted with lovely icing sugar. Cavendish and Harvey candy drops are a fine fruity candy drop.

42688380240059.name: Charms Sour Balls Tins - 12ct
42688380240059.desc: When it comes to making friends, candy is a great ice breaker. Choosing the right candy will determine how successful you are at this endeavor. Charms Sour Balls are definitely the right candy. These delicious hard candy treats make the young happy and the old nostalgic. There is a power in the sour ball that will win friends because it is the perfect combination of both sweet and sour that appeal to everyone. They come in cherry, grape, lemon, lime and of course orange. When you see a tin of these delicious treats, you can't help think of Christmas and other celebrations. Once a can is open it is nearly impossible to stop the smiles and good times. With a whole tin of this candy on your side, you will be able to win a whole lot of new friends and in the end, would you want to be friends with someone who didn't like Charms Sour Balls?

42689102610619.name: Cavendish & Harvey Cherry Drops Tin - 12ct
42689102610619.desc: Gorgeous cherry hard candy drops in stylish tins! Made with natural cherry and dusted with lovely icing sugar. Cavendish and Harvey candy drops are a fine fruity candy drop.

42689102872763.name: Cavendish & Harvey Lemon Drops Tin - 12ct
42689102872763.desc: Gorgeous lemon hard candy drops in stylish tins! Made with natural lemon and dusted with lovely icing sugar. Cavendish and Harvey candy drops are a fine fruity candy drop.

42688748191931.name: Hershey's Milk Chocolate Nostalgia Almond Bar - 24ct
42688748191931.desc: Slip back in time when you take a bite out of one of these Hershey's Milk Chocolate Nostalgia Almond Bars. Featuring the classic milk chocolate Hershey's is famous for, these wrappers have been redesigned to feature images and fonts of the olden days. Make your grandparents' days by bringing them a basket of these Hershey's Milk Chocolate Nostalgia Almond Bars. They'll immediately remember the penny candy shops and graphic design when they were kids while sharing a timeless candy with you. You can also use these Hershey's Milk Chocolate Nostalgia Almond Bars as gifts in olde timey candy baskets or to demonstrate to your family how much design has changes over the years. Celebrate history with these Hershey's Milk Chocolate Nostalgia Almond Bars.

42689103233211.name: Cavendish & Harvey Mixed Fruit Drops Tin - 12ct
42689103233211.desc: Gorgeous mixed fruit hard candy drops in stylish tins! Made with natural fruit flavor and dusted with lovely icing sugar. Cavendish and Harvey candy drops are a fine fruity candy drop.
